attributes.action: reconsider the abolition of the 10p tax rate.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: After working and paying tax for 48 years, my pension will be around £9k when I retire soon.  I will be one of the 5+m people financially penalised by the abolition of 10p tax rate.  Join me to voice your opposition to this unfair tax system.  Thank you

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
